References the selected Country's associated First-Level Divisions from the database and populates the divisionComboBox.
onActionDeleteAppointment(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.HomepageController
Deletes the selected Appointment from the database, utilizing a confirmation alert and presenting a message to the user upon successful deletion of the appointment.

Deletes the selected Customer from the database, utilizing a confirmation alert and presenting a message to the user upon successful deletion of the Customer.

Directs the user to the ModifyAppointment page for the selected Appointment in the homepageTableView.

Directs the user to the ModifyCustomer page for the selected Customer in the homepageTableView.

Changes the language on the login screen between English and French.

Logs the user out of the program and presents them with the Login screen.

Queries the database for all appointments that have the user selected contact.

Queries the database for all appointments that occur in the location selected by the user.
onActionSelectMonth(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ReportsController
Queries the database for all appointments that occur in the month selected by the user.
onActionSelectType(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ReportsController
Queries the database for all appointments of the type selected by the user.
onActionViewAll(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.HomepageController
Loads all the Appointments in the homepageTableView, sorted chronologically in ascending order by utilizing the DynamicTableView.generateTableView() method.
